text: Pen binɨb man anɨb okok, God takaw agñɨ dam dam, taun Papos amjakɨlak. Man Papos anɨb ak, gapman bɨawl kɨli ak yek, yɨb ne Segiyus Polus. Bɨ anɨb ak ne bɨ gos kɨd yɨbɨl agɨl nɨgolɨgup. Ne Banabas ayɨp, Sol ayɨp kɨlop, yɨp God takaw tep ak agel nɨgin agɨl, agek apɨl, takaw tep ak agñɨlek. Agñel nɨŋɨd, bɨawl ne Juda nɨb olap, kuj tap okok nep gɨlɨg, yad bɨ God gos ñek agñeb agolɨgup ak yek. Ne pen anɨb agak, Bɨ omɨŋal anɨb ak, takaw agebil ak ma dɨnɨmɨn agak. Bɨ anɨb ak ne kuj gubay golɨgup ak, yɨb ne Baljisas. Pen Glik takaw agɨl, Elimas agɨlak.
